Dictionary.description: -- Definition -- The possible functions of a railway node within the railway network.

Definition.description: -- Definition -- A railway node where the railway network have a mechanism consisting on a railroad track with two movable rails and the necessary connections, which let vehicles turn from one track to another.
Definition.name: junction

Definition.description: -- Definition -- A railway node where the railway network is a crossed by a road at the same level.
Definition.name: levelCrossing

Definition.description: -- Definition -- A railway node which represents a point where one or more attributes of the railway links connected to it change their value, or a point necessary to describe the geometry of the network.
Definition.name: pseudoNode

Definition.description: -- Definition -- A railway node where the railway starts or ends. The railway network is interrupted at this point.
Definition.name: railwayEnd

Definition.description: -- Definition -- A place in the railway network where trains stop to load/unload cargo or to let passengers get on and off the train.
Definition.name: railwayStop
